title: Mwithiga Labs Online: The Seeker's Command Center
excerpt: Today marks the launch of Mwithiga Labs. A unified hub for my PR and Cybersecurity projects, built on the 'Emerald Seeker' design system.
content: Today marks the launch of Mwithiga Labs. A unified hub for my PR and Cybersecurity projects, built on the 'Emerald Seeker' design system. This isn't just a portfolio; it's a living workspace where I fuse communication strategy with technical security.

title: Dispatch v1.2: Solving the Connection Friction
excerpt: Evolving the Email Assistant into Dispatch. Adding phone and social harvesting to create a true one-click connection portal.
content: A case study on how Dispatch evolved from a simple email harvester into a professional connection engine. By adding phone number and social media link harvesting (Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn), we've reduced the friction of professional outreach significantly.
